expected_goal: Classify input text using predefined labels. If confidence is low, apply preprocessing (cleaning, translation) and reclassify.

atomic: Classify the input text using the predefined labels.
Confidence is high, classification is complete.
All tasks for the high-confidence scenario are complete.
Confidence is low, apply text cleaning preprocessing.
Translate the cleaned text to a standard language.
All tasks for the low-confidence scenario are complete.
macro: Classify the input text using the predefined labels.
Confidence is high, classification is complete.
All tasks for the high-confidence scenario are complete.
Confidence is low, apply text cleaning preprocessing.
Translate the cleaned text to a standard language.
All tasks for the low-confidence scenario are complete.
